algorithm

类 TCR

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithm.TCR

  • public class TCR
extends java.lang.Object
    The main algorithm for three-way conversational recommendation.
    Project: Three-way conversational recommendation.
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Fan Min
    www.fansmale.com, github.com/fansmale/TCR.
    Email: minfan@swpu.edu.cn, minfanphd@163.com.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      The cost matrix.
      (专用程序包) RatingSystem2DBoolean dataset
      The dataset.
      protected int numItems
      Number of items.
      protected int numRatings
      Number of ratings.
      protected int numUsers
      Number of users.
      (专用程序包) int[][] recommendationStatistics
      The statistics information (NN, NP, BN, ...) for current user.
      PopularityBasedRecommendation stage1Recommender
      Stage 1 recommender.
      MF2DBooleanIncremental stage2Recommender
      Stage 1 recommender.
      (专用程序包) double totalCost
      The total cost.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • TCR

        public TCR(java.lang.String paraFilename,
           int paraNumUsers,
           int paraNumItems,
           int paraNumRatings,
           double paraRatingLowerBound,
           double paraRatingUpperBound,
           double paraLikeThreshold,
           boolean paraCompress,
           int paraDataTransformAlgorithm,
           double paraGLTranformV)
        The constructor.
        参数:
        paraFilename - The rating filename.
        paraNumUsers - The number of users.
        paraNumItems - The number of items.
        paraNumRatings - The number of ratings.
        paraRatingLowerBound - The lower bound of ratings.
        paraRatingUpperBound - The upper bound of ratings.
        paraLikeThrehold - The threshold for like.
        paraCompress - Is the data in compress format?
        paraDataTransformAlgorithm - The data transform algorithm.

      • computeTotalCostForUser

        public double computeTotalCostForUser(int paraUser)
        Compute the total cost for a user.
        参数:
        paraUser - The index of the given user.
        paraRecommendations - The recommendations to the user, true for recommendation.
        paraPromotions - The promotions for the user, true for promotion.
        返回:
        The total cost for the user.

      • computeTotalCostForUser

        public double computeTotalCostForUser(int paraUser,
                                      boolean[] paraRecommendations,
                                      boolean[] paraPromotions)
        Compute the total cost for a user.
        参数:
        paraUser - The index of the given user.
        paraRecommendations - The recommendations to the user, true for recommendation.
        paraPromotions - The promotions for the user, true for promotion.
        返回:
        The total cost for the user.
